p: In conclusion, to the best of our knowledge the novel HEV-2b strain NG/17–0500 from Nigerian hepatitis E outbreak 2017 represents the first complete HEV-2 genomic sequence from Sub-Sahara Africa and the second complete HEV-2 sequence worldwide, which contributes to our knowledge of the diversity of HEV-2. Nevertheless, the natural history of NG/17–0500 requires further comprehensive genetic and epidemiological analyses.
